snippet: Robert Allbritton said he intended to turn Capital New York, a news Web site, into an Empire State version of Politico.
abstract: Robert Allbritton, publisher of Washington news publication Politico, says he acquired three-year-old news Web site Capital New York and that he intends to turn it into an Empire State version of Politico.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER and DAVID CARR

lead_paragraph: Robert Allbritton said he intended to turn Capital New York, a news Web site, into an Empire State version of Politico.

headline.main: Politico’s Publisher Plans a Version for New York
headline.print_headline: Politico’s Publisher Plans A Version for New York
